name: Sonic World Racing
text: If this card is activated while you control "Sonic Duck": You can Special Summon 1 "Sonic" monster from your GY, otherwise, Special Summon 1 "Sonic Duck" from your Deck. All "Sonic" monsters you control gain 300 ATK. During damage calculation, if a "Sonic" monster you control battles an opponent’s monster: You can banish 1 "Sonic" monster from your GY; Your monster’s ATK is doubled until the end of the Battle Phase. You can only activate "Sonic World Racing" once per turn.
